Package app.graviton.api.v1

Interfaces and types in this package allow you to access APIs that only appear when run inside the Graviton app browser.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Graviton
    This interface provides ways you can call back into Graviton and control it from within your app.
    GravitonRunInShell
    Implementing this interface on your main class (as configured in your manifest) lets you re-use the top level Graviton shell window, with a smooth transition.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    GravitonTarget
    This annotation defines which version of Graviton this app *targets*.

Package app.graviton.api.v1 Description

Interfaces and types in this package allow you to access APIs that only appear when run inside the Graviton app browser. This module is intentionally kept small and simple with no implementation code in it, so it's perfectly OK to depend on it from apps that'll be primarily used outside of Graviton.

Whilst this package contains types from JavaFX, you don't need to have JavaFX on the classpath or module path at runtime if you are writing some other kind of app: simply avoiding using those types is sufficient because the JVM does late binding on everything.
